content:
Dear @RalfJ,

The standard library test suite is failing under Miri. Would you mind investigating this issue?

Thanks in advance!
Sincerely,
The Miri Cronjobs Bot

Dear @RalfJ and @oli

Thanks in advance!
Sincerely,
